        function getUrlParameter(name) {
            name = name.replace(/[\[]/, '\\[').replace(/[\]]/, '\\]');
            var regex = new RegExp('[\\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)','i');
            var results = regex.exec(location.search);
            return results === null ? '' : decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\+/g, ' '));
        };
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function getCookie(name) {
            var nameEQ = name + "=";
            var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
            for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
                var c = ca[i];
                while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') c = c.substring(1, c.length);
                if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length);
            }
            return null;
        }

        function eraseCookie(name) {
            createCookie(name, "", -1);
        }
        function OpenCIDM(action) {
            try {
                if (action == "signin" || action == "profile") {
                    var popup_url = "";
                    if ($('#hCIDMURL').val() != "") {
                        popup_url = Clean($('#hCIDMURL').val());
                    }
                    else {
                        popup_url = "https://account.giving.ucla.edu/signin";
                    }
                    if (action == "profile") 
                        popup_url = popup_url.replace(/signin/gi, 'Profile');
                    const popup = window.open(popup_url);
                    if (!popup || popup.closed || typeof popup.closed == 'undefined') {
                        //POPUP BLOCKED
                        alert("Pop-up Blocker is enabled! Please add this site to your exception list.");
                        return false;
                    }
                    const pollTimer = window.setInterval(function () {
                        if (popup.closed !== false) { // !== is required for compatibility with Opera
                            window.clearInterval(pollTimer);
                            IsCIDMClosed(action);
                        }
                    }, 1000);
                    return false;
                }
                else {
                    return true;
                }
            }
            catch (err) {
                return false;
            }
        };

        function IsCIDMClosed(argument) {
            const token = getCookie('.UCLAEAIDMID');
            // user is logged in
            if (token) {
                $('#processing').show();
                __doPostBack('lnkBtnLogin', argument);
            }
        }
        function SetFMVPremium() {
            if (document.getElementById('cbFMV').checked) 
            {
                var xAmt = document.getElementById('hTotalAmount').value;
                if (xAmt >= 10 && xAmt < 25) {
                    document.getElementById('hPremiumAmount').value = 1.5;
                }
                else if (xAmt >= 25) {
                    document.getElementById('hPremiumAmount').value = 3.2;
                }
                else
                {
                    document.getElementById('hPremiumAmount').value = 0;
                }
            }
            else
            {
                document.getElementById('hPremiumAmount').value = 0;
            }
        }
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function getXMLHTTP()
{var A=null;try{A=new ActiveXObject('Msxml2.XMLHTTP');}
catch(e){try{A=new ActiveXObject('Microsoft.XMLHTTP');}catch(oc){A=null;}}
if(!A&&typeof XMLHttpRequest!='undefined'){A=new XMLHttpRequest();}
return A;}
function DynamicDropDownController(controlClientId,lookupName,baseUrl){var self=this;this.controlClientId=controlClientId;this.hiddenId='__'+self.controlClientId;this.lookupName=lookupName;this.baseUrl=baseUrl;this.delimiter='|';var xmlHttp;var observers=[];this.getSource=getSource;this.addObserver=addObserver;this.notify=notify;this.load=load;this.init=init;this.persist=persist;function getSource(filter)
{var requestUrl=baseUrl+'&id='+self.lookupName;if(filter!=undefined&&filter!='')
{requestUrl+='&filter='+filter;}
xmlHttp=getXMLHTTP();if(xmlHttp)
{xmlHttp.onreadystatechange=doReadyStateChange;xmlHttp.open('GET',requestUrl,true);xmlHttp.send(null);}}
function doReadyStateChange()
{if(xmlHttp.readyState==4)
{if(xmlHttp.status==200)
{
if((xmlHttp.responseText!=null) && (xmlHttp.responseText.length > 0))
{eval('var d='+xmlHttp.responseText);
populateList(d);}
}
else
{alert('There was a problem retrieving the data:\n'+xmlHttp.statusText);}}}
function populateList(namevalue)
{if(oSelect=document.getElementById(self.controlClientId))
{var content='';for(var i=oSelect.length-1;i>=0;i--)
{oSelect.options[i]=null;}
for(var i=0;i<namevalue.length;i++)
{if(namevalue[i].value==undefined)
{oSelect.options[oSelect.length]=new Option(namevalue[i].name);content+=namevalue[i].name+self.delimiter+namevalue[i].name+self.delimiter;}
else
{opt=new Option(namevalue[i].name,namevalue[i].value);oSelect.options[oSelect.length]=opt;content+=namevalue[i].name+self.delimiter+namevalue[i].value+self.delimiter;}}
if (oSelect.options.length > 0)
{
oSelect.options[0].selected = true;
oSelect.selectedIndex = 0;
//alert(oSelect.previousSibling.tagName);
}
if(content.substr(content.length-1,1)==self.delimiter)
{content=content.substr(0,content.length-1);}
if(oHidden=document.getElementById(self.hiddenId))
{oHidden.value=content;}

if(oSelect.selectedIndex>-1){if(oSelect.fireEvent)
{oSelect.fireEvent('onchange');}
else if(oSelect.dispatchEvent)
{var oEvent=document.createEvent('HTMLEvents');oEvent.initEvent('change',true,true);oSelect.dispatchEvent(oEvent);}}}}
function addObserver(obj)
{var length=observers.length;var found=false;for(var i=0;i<length;i++)
{if(observers[i]==obj)
{found=true;break;}}
if(!found)
{observers[observers.length]=obj;}}
function notify()
{var filter='';var oSelect=document.getElementById(self.controlClientId);if(oSelect!=null&&oSelect.selectedIndex!=-1)
{filter=self.lookupName+','+oSelect.options[oSelect.selectedIndex].value;}
for(i=0;i<observers.length;i++)
{eval(observers[i]+'.load(filter);');

}}
function load(filter)
{this.getSource(filter);
childSelect=document.getElementById(this.controlClientId);
try {
if (childSelect.options.length > 0)
{
childSelect.options[0].selected = true;
childSelect.selectedIndex = 0;
}
if (childSelect.previousSibling.tagName == 'P')
{
childSelect.previousSibling.innerHTML = childSelect.options[0].text;
}
}
catch(err) {}
}
function init()
{if((oSelect=document.getElementById(self.controlClientId)))
{if(!(hidden=document.getElementById(self.hiddenId)))
{hidden=document.createElement('input');hidden.id=self.hiddenId;hidden.name=self.hiddenId;hidden.type='hidden';oSelect.form.appendChild(hidden);}
if(oSelect.options.length==0)
{this.load();}
else
{this.persist(oSelect);}
if(oSelect.attachEvent)
{oSelect.attachEvent('onchange',notify);}
else if(oSelect.addEventListener)
{oSelect.addEventListener('change',notify,false);}
else
{oSelect.onchange=notify;}}}
function persist(oSelect)
{var content='';for(var i=0;i<oSelect.options.length;i++)
{content+=oSelect.options[i].text+self.delimiter+oSelect.options[i].value+self.delimiter;}
if(content.substr(content.length-1,1)==self.delimiter)
{content=content.substr(0,content.length-1);}
if((hidden=document.getElementById(self.hiddenId)))
{hidden.value=content;}}}</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function SubmitDisableEnable(arg) {
        var btn;
        btn = document.getElementById('btnPayPal');
        if (btn != null)
            arg ? btn.setAttribute('disabled', 'disabled') : btn.removeAttribute('disabled');
        btn = document.getElementById('btnSubmitCC');
        if (btn != null)
            arg ? btn.setAttribute('disabled', 'disabled') : btn.removeAttribute('disabled');
        btn = document.getElementById('inpSubmitPRD');
        if (btn != null)
            arg ? btn.setAttribute('disabled', 'disabled') : btn.removeAttribute('disabled');
    }
    function GetWord(aString, delimit, wordNum) {
        var dl = delimit.length
        var pos = 0
        var tempstr = ""
        var nextpos = 0

        if (wordNum <= 0) {
            return aString
        }
        else {
            tempstr = aString

            for (var i = 1; i < wordNum; i++) {
                pos = tempstr.indexOf(delimit) + dl
                if (pos < dl) {
                    return ""
                } else {
                    tempstr = tempstr.substring(pos)
                }
            }

            nextPos = tempstr.indexOf(delimit)

            if (nextPos == -1) {
                return tempstr
            } else {
                return tempstr.substring(0, nextPos)
            }
        }
    }

    function SetOrgs(sType, sDDLID, sOrgListID, sFundListID) {
        var ddl = document.getElementById(sDDLID);
        var ddlHidden = document.getElementById("__" + sDDLID);
        var inp = document.getElementById(sOrgListID);
        var hSelectedOrgType = document.getElementById('hSelectedOrgType');
        hSelectedOrgType.value = sType;

        var sp = document.getElementById('lblWhich');
        if (sp != null) {
            if (sType == "S") {
                sp.innerHTML = "Which School Are You Giving To?";
            }
            else if (sType == "M") {
                sp.innerHTML = "Which Campus Area Are You Giving To?";
            }
            else if (sType == "C") {
                sp.innerHTML = "Which Cause Are You Giving To?";
            }
        }

        try {
            if (isPostBack) {
                sFundListID = 'xxyyzz';
                ddl = null;
            }
        }
        catch (err) { }
        var i = 0;
        var option;
        try {
            if (ddl != null && inp != null) {
                for (var option in ddl) {
                    ddl.remove(option);
                }
                option = document.createElement('option');
                option.value = "0";
                option.text = "--- Select ---";
                ddl.add(option);
                ddl.selectedIndex = 0;

                if (ddlHidden != null) {
                    ddlHidden.value = "--- Select ---|0|";
                }

                var ddlFund = document.getElementById(sFundListID);
                if (ddlFund != null) {
                    for (var fund in ddlFund) {
                        ddlFund.remove(fund);
                    }
                    option = document.createElement('option');
                    option.value = "";
                    option.text = "--- Select ---";
                    ddlFund.add(option);
                    ddlFund.selectedIndex = 0;
                }
                var sOrgList = inp.value;
                var sThisOrg = " ";
                var sThisCat;
                var iNumOrgs = 0;
                while (sThisOrg != "") {
                    i = i + 1;
                    sThisOrg = GetWord(sOrgList, ";", i);
                    sThisCat = GetWord(sThisOrg, "|", 1);
                    if (sThisCat == sType) {
                        iNumOrgs++;
                        option = document.createElement('option');
                        option.value = GetWord(sThisOrg, "|", 2);
                        option.text = GetWord(sThisOrg, "|", 3);
                        ddl.add(option);
                        if (ddlHidden != null) {
                            ddlHidden.value += option.text + "|" + option.value + "|";
                        }
                    }
                }
                var divWhichOrg = document.getElementById('divWhichOrg');
                if (iNumOrgs == 1) {
                    if (ddl.fireEvent) {
                        ddl.selectedIndex = 1;
                        divWhichOrg.style.display = "none";
                        ddl.fireEvent('onchange');
                    }
                    else if (ddl.dispatchEvent) {
                        ddl.selectedIndex = 1;
                        divWhichOrg.style.display = "none";
                        var oEvent = document.createEvent('HTMLEvents'); oEvent.initEvent('change', true, true); ddl.dispatchEvent(oEvent);
                    }
                    else
                        divWhichOrg.style.display = "block";
                }
                else {
                    divWhichOrg.style.display = "block";
                }
                if (!isPostBack) {
                    ddl.previousSibling.innerHTML = ddl.options[ddl.selectedIndex].text;
                    ddlFund.previousSibling.innerHTML = ddlFund.options[ddlFund.selectedIndex].text;
                }
            }
        }
        catch (err) { }
    }

    function Clean(s) {
        //  var newString = escape(s);
        var newString = "";
        if (s != null) {
            var sUpper = s.toUpperCase();
            if (sUpper.indexOf("JAVASCRIPT") != -1 || sUpper.indexOf("JQUERY") != -1 || sUpper.indexOf("JSCRIPT") != -1) {
                newString = "";
            }
            else {
                newString = s.replace("<", "").replace(">", "");
            }
        }
        return newString;
    }

    function GetWord(aString, delimit, wordNum) {

        var dl = delimit.length
        var pos = 0
        var tempstr = ""
        var nextpos = 0

        if (wordNum <= 0) {
            return aString
        }
        else {
            tempstr = aString

            for (var i = 1; i < wordNum; i++) {
                pos = tempstr.indexOf(delimit) + dl
                if (pos < dl) {
                    return ""
                } else {
                    tempstr = tempstr.substring(pos)
                }
            }

            nextPos = tempstr.indexOf(delimit)

            if (nextPos == -1) {
                return tempstr
            } else {
                return tempstr.substring(0, nextPos)
            }
        }
    }

    function submitValues(url, params) {
        $('#processing').show();
        var form = ['<form method="POST" action="', url, '">'];

        for (var key in params)
            form.push('<input type="hidden" id="', key, '" name="', key, '" value="', params[key], '"/>');

        form.push('</form>');

        jQuery(form.join('')).appendTo('body')[0].submit();
    }

    function ddlJointGiftChanged(ctl) {
        var checked = false;
        var revealHideClass = ctl.getAttribute("hide-class");
        $revealWrapper = $('#' + ctl.getAttribute("data-reveal-id"));
        if (ctl.value == "Y") {
            $('.' + revealHideClass).show();
            checked = true;
        }
        else {
            $('.' + revealHideClass).hide();
            $('.' + revealHideClass + 'wrap').addClass("hidden");
            $('.' + revealHideClass).find('.control-checkbox').removeClass('focus checked');
        }
        $revealWrapper
            .toggleClass('hidden', !checked)
            .find('[data-validate]:visible')
            .toggleClass('skip-validation', !checked)
            .end()
            .find('[data-validate]:hidden')
            .addClass('skip-validation');
    }

    function validateCaptcha() {
        // Individual string variables storing captcha values
        var rToken = $("input#recaptchaToken").val();

        // Ajax post to page web method that will do server-side captcha validation
        $.ajax({
            type: "POST",
            url: "validate.ashx",
            data: "recaptchaToken=" + rToken,
            async: false,
            success: function (msg) {
                recaptchaIsValid = (msg === 'true');
            },
            error: function () { alert('error'); }
        });
    }
</script>
